factionsx.claiming:
Claim for your own faction by using `/f claim <faction> <radius>`

**System Factions/Force Claiming**
> **1.** Run `/fx bypass` to enable bypass mode
> **2.** Use `/f claim <faction (warzone/safezone)> <radius>` to claim land for the defined faction
factionsx.bypass: To enable bypass mode use `/fx bypass`
factionsx.chat:
**DeluxeChat**
Use PAPI Placeholders to handle relation colors, faction tag/name or faction rank. Placeholders can be found [here](https://wiki.savagelabs.net/en/factionsx/placeholders)

**EssentialsXChat/EssentialsChat**
Ensure that the `chatHandledByAnotherPlugin` option is set to false.
> **Example:**

 `"chatHandledByAnotherPlugin": false,
"chatFactionPlaceholder": "[FACTION]",
"chatFactionReplaceString": "[RELATIONAL_COLOR][TAG] [FACTION] ",
"chatNoFactionReplaceString": " ",`

 EssentialsXChat/EssentialsChat do not directly support PAPI placeholders so you will need to use `[TAG]` and `[FACTION]` in the Chat section of the Essnetials Config.
